item.title: LG UH950T Super UHD TV: Australian Review
item.description:
LG UH950T Super UHD TV: Australian Review

Here at Gizmodo, we like OLED TVs. We really like OLED TVs. But OLED is still mostly a technology for the top end of town, and if you want to buy a TV with a slightly more reasonable price tag then your only legitimate option is an LED-backlit LCD.

item.title: LG OLED65G6V review
item.description:
LG OLED65G6V review

A superb statement product from LG, which shows the impressive capabilities of the company's 4K OLED TVs - for a price Web OS 3.0 is slicker than ever Cheaper E6 alternative has just as impressive a picture Reviewed on Which is the best TV? That is something we are often asked.

Here at Gizmodo, we like OLED TVs. We really like OLED TVs. But OLED is still mostly a technology for the top end of town, and if you want to buy a TV with a slightly more reasonable price tag then your only legitimate option is an LED-backlit LCD.

item.title: LG Signature OLED 4K Ultra HD TV Wins Value Electronics 2016 TV Shootout
item.description:
LG Signature OLED 4K Ultra HD TV Wins Value Electronics 2016 TV Shootout

Posted Thu Jun 23, 2016 at 04:15 PM PDT by Steven Cohen The new "King of TV" has been named. LG's 65-inch G6 OLED has been crowned the winner of the Value Electronics 2016 TV Shootout at the CE Week tradeshow in New York City.

item.title: LG SIGNATURE 4K OLED TV Crowned 'King Of TV' At CE Week 2016
item.description:
LG SIGNATURE 4K OLED TV Crowned 'King Of TV' At CE Week 2016

June 23, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- LG Electronics' SIGNATURE 4K OLED TV was crowned "2016 King of TV" in the 13 th Annual Value Electronics TV Shootoutâ„¢ in a competition among four contending flagship 4K Ultra HD TV models from LG and other leading brands during CE Week in .

item.title: GeForce GTX 980 Ti round-up: 12 graphics cards review
item.description:
GeForce GTX 980 Ti round-up: 12 graphics cards review

If you want to game in Ultra HD, you will pretty much be forced to use a high-end graphics card, such as the GeForce GTX 980 Ti from Nvidia. Once you've decided to invest in one, you will find that there is quite a lot of choice.

item.title: LG's 'Best Ever' 4K Ultra HD OLED TVs Are Out In Australia Next Week
item.description:
LG's 'Best Ever' 4K Ultra HD OLED TVs Are Out In Australia Next Week

LG's last couple of OLED TVs have been pretty damn amazing - we've thought so, at least. There's an even better and more visually arresting TV about to hit electronics stores shelves, though; the new G6T Signature is a $10,999 OLED monster supporting the latest and greatest Dolby Vision and HDR codecs, with a built-in soundbar for serious audio.

item.title: LG's 2016 OLED TVs are more affordable, but they're still going to cost you
item.description:
LG's 2016 OLED TVs are more affordable, but they're still going to cost you

LG has finally unveiled pricing and availability for its entire line of 2016 OLED TVs, and although the new display tech is becoming a little more affordable each year, you'll still need to dig deep to get one.

item.title: Phil Spencer discusses the new Xbox One S
item.description:
Phil Spencer discusses the new Xbox One S

The Xbox One S was announced at our Xbox At E3 2016 briefing and I had the opportunity to sit down with Phil Spencer and chat about it.
